```py
def predict(self, dataset):
    self.model.eval() 
    device = torch.device("cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available()\
                          else "cpu")
    with torch.no_grad(): 
        loader = torch.utils.data.DataLoader(dataset, batch_size = 32) 
```

def predict(self, dataset):

    **device** = torch.device("cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available()\
                          else "cpu")
    with torch.no_grad(): 
        loader = torch.utils.data.DataLoader(dataset, batch_size = 32)
